Question: NAV-001 - The rotational axis of the Earth runs through the...
Correct: geographic North Pole and on the geographic South Pole.

Question: NAV-002 - Which statement is correct with regard to the polar axis of the Earth?
Correct: The polar axis of the Earth crosses the geographic South Pole and the geographic North Pole and is perpendicular to the plane of the equator.
